author: Ainsley Harriott
method: Lightly grease a small microwave-proof bowl. Place all the ingredients except the egg and yoghurt into a food processor and blend to combine. Crack in the egg and pulse briefly to mix. Pour the mixture into the prepared bowl and microwave on high for 4-5 minutes, or until the pudding is set. To serve, turn the pudding out onto a plate. Serve in bowls with a dollop of yoghurt.
ingredients: 55g/2oz self-raising flour,  55g/2oz butter, softened, plus extra for greasing,  55g/2oz caster sugar,  1 tbsp milk,  1 tbsp clear honey,  2.5cm/1in piece root ginger, peeled and finely grated,  1 free-range egg,  Greek-style yoghurt, to serve
